text:
January 8, 1958
Dr* Ifeurice F* Seay
Director, Division of Education
U* K« Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice*
in reply to your latter of January 7* we are indeed already
certified as a non-profit corporation, eligible to receive
ta3fr-e393fflpt funds* Attached is a copy of the document which
establishes this status®
All grant funds other than those from the W* K* Kellogg
Foundation during recent years, have been given directly to the
NAEB, rather than through the university of Illinois* It was
our impression that grants through the University represented
the procedure preferred by the W* K« Kellogg Foundation*
Wa5re pleased to be able to send this information at once*
Please let us know if there is anything else we can provide*
Sincerely,
Kerry J* Skarnia
Exsbutive Director
